plugin.name: Calcium Event Data Labeler
plugin.author: George
plugin.description: Comprehensive training data labeling and dataset creation tool for calcium event detection. Create high-quality labeled datasets with interactive tools, automated labeling, quality assessment, and data augmentation.
plugin.long_description:
Calcium Event Data Labeler for FLIKA provides everything needed to create training datasets for deep learning calcium event detection models.
Interactive Manual Labeling: - Frame-by-frame ROI drawing tools - Multiple drawing modes (rectangle, ellipse, polygon, freehand) - Class selection (spark, puff, wave) - Undo/redo support - Save/load annotations in multiple formats
Automated Label Generation: - Intensity-based event detection - Temporal filtering and morphological cleanup - Connected component analysis - Automatic classification by size and duration - Template matching (advanced)
Label Quality Assessment: - Class distribution analysis - Spatial and temporal coverage metrics - Label consistency checking - Annotation completeness verification - Inter-annotator agreement (Cohen's kappa)
Dataset Creation: - Extract patches from full frames - Train/validation/test splitting with stratification - Class balancing via intelligent oversampling - Multiple output formats
Data Augmentation: - Geometric transforms (rotation, flipping, elastic) - Intensity variations (brightness, contrast, gamma) - Temporal transforms (warping, subsampling) - Configurable augmentation pipelines
Perfect companion to the Calcium Event Detector plugin for creating high-quality training datasets!
